title: Full Body Stretching Routine (15 min. Follow Along)
description:
Join me for a full body stretching routine that can be used by beginners or more advanced athletes. This stretching routine helps improve flexibility, joint health, muscle strength and maintains a healthy body. You don't want to miss out on this one :)

Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNzhD3skhRA
Download this routine...
My Free Program ► https://www.strengthside.com/thedaily

This full body stretching routine for flexibility and mobility is aimed at opening up all the ranges of motion of the body. I made this stretching routine with no equipment or gym needed! This full body stretch is for beginners and athletes as well. You can use this as a stretching warmup for other training, or as a daily routine to keep your body healthy. These stretching exercises also focus on strengthening certain ranges of motion. The muscles stretched in this routine are the calves, hamstrings, quads, hip flexors, lats, traps, chest, shoulders, and neck. These stretching exercises for men & women can also be done after a workout for a cool down. Enjoy!

comments:
0:21 Hip rotations left leg: 8
0:54 Hip rotations right leg: 8
1:33 Hip rotations both: 5
2:06 Upper back stretch: 1 min
3:21 Front hip/quad stretch both sides: 1 min
6:10 Shoulder extension or reverse plank: 1 mi
7:31 Straight leg good morning: 10 hold for ten sec on the last rep
8:44 Deep squat: 1 min
10:30 Downward dog bent straight leg press: 10
I replaced crawl with a plank for 1 Min

Tried this daily for 4 weeks. Here the results:

Arms have full range of motion
Shoulder are "down" again
Hip does not "fall down" while walking anymore
My legs gained significant muscle
Full control on my hips
Able to internally rotate my hips (did not know human body can do that...)

This is just a small overview, but fellas: Thats it. Just do it and try.
I came from a home-office body and was folded like a piece of paper from 60+ hours at my Laptop a week

After trying almost everything in the internet to make my backpain go away, this is the only solution I found that actually works. Don't miss the second video that belongs to this practise.

Ahh.. not to forget: I have Scoliosis with 3 areas having partly 31° screw up.

But the BEST about this video: The voice, the softly spoken words. Its such a lovely contrast to Xmen like Bodybuilders here at youtube. I almost thought you americans only communicate with yelling.

Much love to anyone and specially to Josh!
I’m 72 consider myself fit but needed to improve flexibility. Found you 4 days ago. Already seeing improvements! This 15 min stretching is now going to be my start to the day! Thank you!

For my convenience:
Hip rotations left leg
Hip rotations right leg
Hip rotations both
Upper back stretch
Couch stretch
Shoulder extension or reverse plank
Straight leg good morning
Deep squat
Downward dog bent straight leg press
Crawl
